heading: HR00953
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRARIAN REFORM TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, TO DETERMINE THE ACTUAL REMAINING HECTARAGE OF DAVAO PENAL COLONY (DAPECOL) AND URGING FOR THE  DEED OF TRANSFER FROM DAPECOL -BUREAU OF CORRECTIONS (BUCOR) TO THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRARIAN REFORM (DAR), PARTICULARLY THE 5,212.46-HECTARES LAND UNDER THE JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT (JVA) BETWEEN BUCOR AND THE TAGUM AGRICULTURAL DEVELOPMENT COMPANY, INC.
